document_name: Law No. 20.780 Tax reform that modifies the income tax system and introduces various adjustments in the tax system
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CHL/2017/CHL-2017-01-01-Law No. 20.780 Tax reform that modifies the income tax system and introduces various adjustments in the tax system_a83478a6ca6f83b6c4c3091b950a5d91.pdf
document_description: The law no 20.780 introduces in Art. 8 a green tax on fixed sources of pollutants, including CO2. The tax started to apply in 2017 and is directed to the industries with a thermal power generation greater than or equal to 50 MW.Article 8. of this law was amended in February 2020 by law 21.210 as following in order to set emissions thresholds and precisions for taxation.
